name: Wood Block Puzzles
description:
Wood Block Puzzle is the most addictive and classic wood puzzle game!

Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids to complete the shape.Easy to play and get addicted while playing this wood puzzle game.

Best wood themed block puzzle game. Excise your brain concentration, best brain games for any age group with wooden block puzzle for free and you can enjoy it everywhere, every time without internet connection.

How to play :

- Drag the wood blocks to move them
- Try to fit them all in the row or column
- Hints are always there to help you
- Blocks can't be rotated
- Don't worry, no time limits

Wood Block Puzzle Features :

- Best wood themed block puzzle game
- Various difficulty levels
- 90+ wood puzzles to solve
- Smooth and very fine animation
- Simple rules and easy user interface
- Various blocks and colorful graphic
- Best wood design and color
- Hours of fun, exciting play
- New block puzzle classic
- Wood block puzzle
- New block puzzle game for FREE
- Block puzzle extreme try to complete the shape
- Block puzzle wood is addictive game
- Block puzzle Sliding Puzzles
- Block puzzle classic is a blockbuster game

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! Your feedback will be used in future updates.
Contact us if you have any questions, ideas for improvements or experience any bugs when playing the game.

Last, but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played "Wood Block Puzzle"
